title: Strengthening Competencies in Analyzing the Pedagogical Suitability of Mathematics Textbook Lessons

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: VR simulations in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments enabling realistic classroom scenario simulations, focusing on mathematics textbook analysis competency development

learning_goals: Learners can systematically explain procedures for analyzing pedagogical appropriateness in mathematics textbook lessons
Learners can identify three or more epistemological flaws in textbook lesson designs related to proportionality
Learners can write reports critically evaluating limitations of textbook content by applying formative intervention strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
